ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Bookmark 'stability'
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not really. I’d like to bookmark posts or comment from a blog, but that doesn’t invalidate the blog’s index page as an entry point. By the way… why

ts or comment from a blog,
